basic.name: Hungering Arrow (Q)
basic.description: Fire an arrow that deals 140 damage to the first target hit, then seeks up to 2 additional enemies, prioritizing Heroes, dealing 80 damage. Can hit an enemy multiple times.

basic.name: Multishot (W)
basic.description: Deal 159 damage to enemies within the target area.

basic.name: Vault (E)
basic.description: Dash to the target area. Valla's next Basic Attack within 2 seconds deals 6% increased damage per stack of Hatred.

heroic.name: Strafe (R)
heroic.description: Rapidly attack enemies within 10 range for 60 damage per hit, prioritizing Heroes over Minions. Valla is able to move and use Vault while strafing. Lasts for 4 seconds.

heroic.name: Rain of Vengeance (R)
heroic.description: Launch a wave of Shadow Beasts that deals 250 damage and Stuns enemies in the target area for 0.5 seconds.Stores up to 2 charges.

trait.name: Hatred (T)
trait.description: Basic Attacks grant a stack of Hatred, up to 10. Each Hatred stack increases Basic Attack damage by 8% and Movement Speed by 1%. Lasts 6 seconds.{highlight}If there's no allied heroes close to Valla she will receive extra 150% health regeneration {/highlight}

1.name: Steady Aim
1.description: {highlight}If there are no enemy heroes within 5 range from Valla she deals extra 10% damage. At 10 maximum stacks of Hatred increase Valla Basic Attack Range by 10%.{/highlight}

1.name: Hot Pursuit
1.description: {highlight}Valla's Hatred reaches maximum stacks on takedown participation. At 10 stacks, additional takedowns grant 5% movement speed and 10% attack speed bonuses to current Hatred stacks until expiration, stacks up to 5 times{/highlight}

1.name: Fire Support
1.description: {highlight}At 10 stacks of Hatred, Valla's basic attacks explode on impact, dealing 20% of her basic attack damage to nearby enemies. Each enemy hit by these explosions reduces Valla's ability cooldowns by 0.1 seconds.{/highlight}
passives: {highlight}Each stack of Hatred increase Valla mana regeneration by 20%.{/highlight}

4.name: Entangling Shot
4.description: {highlight}Hungering arrow now bounce only 1 time prioritizing other enemy heroes, the bounce speed will be increased by 400%. If it hits a second target it will slightly pull both targets towards the center of the hit.{/highlight}

4.name: Bolas
4.description: {highlight}Hungering arrow first hit will wrap an explosive bola on the first enemy hit. After 1.25 seconds that bola will explode dealing 140 damage and knockbacking close enemies{/highlight}

4.name: Repeating Arrow
4.description: Vault no longer has a Mana cost. Casting Vault resets the cooldown of Hungering Arrow. {highlight}Hungering arrow deals 150% extra damage to Mercenaries and Monsters and instantly kill troops.{/highlight}

7.name: Death Dealer
7.description: Increase Vaults Basic Attack damage bonus from 6% to 15% per stack of Hatred. If this attack kills its victim within 1.5 seconds, the Mana cost and cooldown of Vault are refunded. {highlight}Instantly kill troops{/highlight}
passives: Reduce the cooldown of Vault by 5 seconds.

7.name: Smoke Screen
7.description: {highlight}Becomes invisible during Vault and 0.25 seconds after{/highlight}

7.name: Caltrops
7.description: {highlight}Drop 3 Caltrops while Vaulting that deal 60 damage and Slow enemies by 20% for 1 second. Enemy hero hits by caltrops decrease Vault cooldown by 3.5 seconds{/highlight}

10.name: Strafe
10.description: Rapidly attack enemies within 10 range for 60 damage per hit, prioritizing Heroes over Minions. Valla is able to move and use Vault while strafing. Lasts for 4 seconds.

10.name: Rain of Vengeance
10.description: Launch a wave of Shadow Beasts that deals 250 damage and Stuns enemies in the target area for 0.5 seconds.Stores up to 2 charges.

13.name: Evasive fire
13.description: Multishot heals for {highlight}4%{/highlight} of Valla maximum health per enemy hero hit{highlight} and slows them for 25% for 2.5 seconds.{/highlight}

13.name: Tempered by Discipline
13.description: Basic Attacks heal for 10% of the damage dealt, increased by 2% per Hatred stack.

13.name: Gloom
13.description: Activate to consume all Hatred, granting 3 Spell Armor per Hatred consumed for 5 seconds.Passive: Gain 15 Spell Armor, and each stack of Hatred heals for 1.2 Health per second.

16.name: Arsenal
16.description: {highlight}Grenades damage reduce targets armor by 10 for 3 seconds. Multiple grenade hits armor reduction stacks. If Valla hits an close enemy hero with Multishot she will dash a short distance backwards.{/highlight}

16.name: Awaraness
16.description: {highlight}Maintaining maximum Hatred stacks for 5 seconds grants Valla Awareness. When Awareness is active, the next instance of fatal damage is prevented, healing Valla for 30% of her maximum Health, cleansing her from negative effects and making her invisible for 2 seconds.{/highlight}

16.name: Manticore
16.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack against the same Hero deals an additional 5% of their maximum Health as damage.

20.name: Death Siphon
20.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Strafe increases its duration by 0.125 seconds. Strafe also fires penetrating bolts in a line for 34 damage every 0.25 seconds.

20.name: Storm of Vengeance
20.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes reduce the cooldown of Rain of Vengeance by 5 seconds.
passives: {highlight}Valla deals 20% additional damage to enemies above 75% health.{/highlight}

20.name: Vengeance
20.description: {highlight}When an allied Hero is killed, Valla reveals the enemy Hero responsible for 5 seconds. During this time, Valla gains 25% increased attack range and damage against the revealed Hero. She will also be untargeatable to him{/highlight}
